animeInput.title: Spirited Away
animeInput.plot: Chihiro and her parents are moving to a small Japanese town in the countryside, much to Chihiro's dismay. On the way to their new home, Chihiro's father makes a wrong turn and drives down a lonely one-lane road which dead-ends in front of a tunnel. Her parents decide to stop the car and explore the area. They go through the tunnel and find an abandoned amusement park on the other side, with its own little town. When her parents see a restaurant with great-smelling food but no staff, they decide to eat and pay later. However, Chihiro refuses to eat and decides to explore the theme park a bit more. She meets a boy named Haku who tells her that Chihiro and her parents are in danger, and they must leave immediately. She runs to the restaurant and finds that her parents have turned into pigs. In addition, the theme park turns out to be a town inhabited by demons, spirits, and evil gods. At the center of the town is a bathhouse where these creatures go to relax. The owner of the bathhouse ...
animeInput.awards: Top Rated Movies #28 | Won 1 Oscar. Another 57 wins & 31 nominations.
animeInput.stars: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino, Rumi Hiiragi
animeInput.companies: Tokuma Shoten, Studio Ghibli, Nippon Television Network (NTV)
animeInput.tagline: The tunnel led Chihiro to a mysterious town.
animeInput.keywords: spirit,spirit world,studio ghibli,child protagonist,sister sister relationship

animeInput.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
animeInput.plot: Two brothers lose their mother to an incurable disease. With the power of "alchemy", they use taboo knowledge to resurrect her. The process fails, and as a toll for using this type of alchemy, the older brother, Edward Elric loses his left leg while the younger brother, Alphonse Elric loses his entire body. To save his brother, Edward sacrifices his right arm and is able to affix his brother's soul to a suit of armor. With the help of a family friend, Edward receives metal limbs - "automail" - to replace his lost ones. With that, Edward vows to search for the Philosopher's Stone to return the brothers to their original bodies, even if it means becoming a "State Alchemist", one who uses his/her alchemy for the military.
animeInput.stars: Kent Williams, Iemasa Kayumi, Vic Mignogna, Muriel Hofmann
animeInput.genres: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi

animeInput.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
animeInput.plot: Yuji Itadori, a kind-hearted teenager, joins his school's Occult Club for fun, but discovers that its members are actual sorcerers who can manipulate the energy between beings for their own use. He hears about a cursed talisman - the finger of Sukuna, a demon - and its being targeted by other cursed beings. Yuji eats the finger to protect his friends, and ends up becoming Sukuna's host. However, Yuji discovers that he has inherited magic and is able to control this power without interference from Sukuna. He joins the Tokyo Metropolitan Magic Technical College to consumes all of Sukuna's fingers, which will enable a full exorcism to take place that will free him.
animeInput.stars: Junya Enoki, Adam McArthur, Yûichi Nakamura

trailer.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
trailer.videoDescription: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

tvSeriesInfo.creators: Seong-Hu Park, Hideaki Abe, Gege Akutami

animeInput.title: One Punch Man
animeInput.plot: In a world of superhuman beings, Saitama is a unique hero, he can defeat enemies with a single punch. But being just one hero in a world filled with them, his life is empty and hollow: he gets no respect from anyone, he displays a laidback attitude to everything and for the most part, he finds his overall hero life pointless... and worst of all, he lost his hair due to intense training. These are the adventures of an ordinary yet extraordinary hero.
animeInput.stars: Makoto Furukawa, Kaito Ishikawa, Max Mittelman
animeInput.companies: Asatsu, Bandai Namco Arts, Bandai Spirits
